entry.title: Venison Droewors: Delicious free range pet treat (100g)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Raw Love
Type: Pet Snacks
Price: 29.00

Raw Love Venison Droewors (100 g) is made with free range organic venison which is air dried and contains no salt, grains, sugar or other additives - only delicious goodness for your pet. Perfect as a treat or a reward.

  • Organic air dried free range venison
  • Contains no grains, fat, salt, sugar or other harmful additives
  • Packaging made with recycled materials and manufactured by a community upliftment project 
  • High in protein
  • Locally produced to reduce your carbon footprint

Ingredients

Air-dried droëwors made with organic venison trimmings and plant casings – contains 5% canola oil. NO fat, NO salt, NO spices.Contains Potassium Sorbate.

Directions for use

Use as an anytime treat or training reward - these pet treats will be sure to get tails wagging!
entry.s:tag: Raw Love Venison Droewors for Pets

entry.title: Food Grade Diatomaceous Earth
entry.summary:
Vendor: Raw Love
Type: Pet Grooming & Hygiene
Price: 60.00

Raw Love's Food Grade Diatomaceous Earth has many health benefits for your pets.  Diatomaceous Earth is used for body detox and to eliminate worms and external pet parasites like ticks and fleas. It is a very rich source of silica, which promotes healthy tendons, cartilage, blood vessels  and bones. (350 g)

  • Natural de-wormer, detoxifier and internal parasite cleanser (dewormer)
  • Kills ticks and fleas naturally without harming your pet
  • Improves digestion and nutrient absorption
  • Combats arthritis and joint pain & improves skin and coat condition
  • pH alkaliniser & blood cleanser
  • Sun and air dried to retain natural goodness
  • Simply add to food

Ingredients

100% organic Diatomaceous Earth. OMRI listed (Organic Material Review Institute) 

Directions for use

Sprinkle over your pet's food daily for best results or rub on coat to control ticks and fleas.

INTERNAL PARASITE CONTROL

Helps keep intestinal parasites in check, including roundworms, pinworms and tapeworms.

Sprinkle Diatomaceous Earth over your pet’s food once daily for 30 days, then continue treatment only as needed.

  • Kittens: ½ tsp
  • Cats: 1 tsp
  • Puppies: ½ – 1 tsp
  • Dogs under 15kg: 1 tsp
  • Dogs over 15kg : 1 tbsp

EXTERNAL PARASITE CONTROL

For best results, treat all affected areas of the home (bedding, furniture, carpets etc.) at the same time you treat your pet for fleas and ticks. That way, you can ensure you’ll be eliminating larvae and eggs as well as the adult fleas and ticks.

  • Apply to your pet’s coat once a week for a month, and then as needed.
  • Use a brush or comb to gently work the powder into your pet’s fur, concentrating on problem areas.
  • Be careful to avoid your pet’s eye area. Gloves are recommended.
  • Dust your pet’s bedding and sleeping areas with Diatomaceous Earth as well.
  • Dust any bedding, furniture, carpeting or other areas of the home. Leave for 24 hours before vacuuming.
  • Kills adult fleas and ticks within 72 hours of contact.

More information on Diatomaceous Earth﻿

Diatomaceous Earth (DE) is a fine rock powder made up of tiny fossilised marine organisms known as diatoms. These tiny fossils are made of silica, which is safe for mammals, but kills pests like ticks and fleas within 72 hours; DE does this by breaking down the insects’ exoskeletons and drying them out.

Many commercial tick and flea treatments can actually do more harm than good. Packed with harsh synthetics, they can be toxic to you and your pets. Raw Love Diatomaceous Earth on the other hand, simply dries out fleas and ticks without affecting your beloved animals. The product is OMRI listed (Organic Material Review Institute), and 100% safe.

You’ll find no harmful synthetic ingredients in Diatomaceous Earth; it can even be sprinkled around your home and garden to get rid of bed bugs, slugs and all sorts of unwelcome critters. This is multi-purpose natural pest control at its best.

Disclaimer: This medicine has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness. Please consult your veterinarian if symptoms persist.
entry.s:tag: Natural tick and flea control for pets
Raw Love Diatomaceous Earth for Dogs Cats

entry.title: Bed Time Treats: Delicious healthy bed time biscuits for pets (100g)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Raw Love
Type: Pet Snacks
Price: 30.00

Raw Love Bed Time Treats (100 g) come in a cute moon shape and are made with organic Chamomile & Passion Flowers to help pets sleep tight! Dogs and cats will love these delicious, natural grain free biscuits!  

  • Wheat Free Biscuits with organic Chamomile and Passion Flowers 
  • Helps to promote sleep, relax nerves and reduce stress.
  • No added fat, salt, sugar, xylitol, preservatives or other harmful additives
  • Packaging made with recycled materials and locally manufactured by a community upliftment project 
  • Locally produced to reduce your carbon footprint

Ingredients

Lentil flour, free range eggs, raw honey, organic Chamomile flowers, organic Passiflora, organic coconut oil, baking soda. Contains NO added spices, salt, sugar, xylitol,  preservatives or colourants - only pure goodness for your dog or cat!

Directions for use

Use as a night time treat to relax dogs and cats!
entry.s:tag: Healthy biscuits for dogs and cats

entry.summary:
Vendor: Raw Love
Type: Pet Snacks
Price: 55.50

Type: Pet Snacks
Price: 53.50

Raw Love Health Treats (200 g) are delicious natural grain free biscuits for pets with Organic Rosehip, Rooibos & Sutherlandia, offering a yummy organic pet treat that improves their health too!

  • Rooibos, Rosehip and Sutherlandia are traditionally used to boost the immune system and assist in the treatment of cancer and diabetes.
  • Both Rooibos and Rosehip are often used to treat skin conditions.
